text: A partner may lend money to and do other business with the limited partnership and has the same rights and obligations with respect to the loan or other transaction as a person that is not a partner.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 112 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-701.09

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Business transactions of partner with partnership.
